otp.group6.view

Class UserSettingsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • otp.group6.view.UserSettingsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class UserSettingsController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Class controls the UserSettingsView.fxml and it main function is to make user able to change their password or to delete their account.
    Author:
    Joonas Soininen

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL arg0,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
        Method initializes this class when loaded, calls setLocalization(ResourceBundle) to set certain variables passing the ResourceBundle to it.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        arg1, - is the resource bundle provided from the MainControler.java containing the language settings Calls pwReminder() to remind the user of the correct way to input the password.

      • setLocalization

        private void setLocalization(java.util.ResourceBundle bundle)
        Method sets all visible texts and button labels to chosen language. Sets specific images to specific buttons.
        Parameters:
        bundle - transfers the localization data to the method so the right language is set

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser()
        Method to delete the users account from the database and make sure user is logged out. Alerts are used to give feedback to the user.

      • changePassword

        public void changePassword()
        Method used to change the users password. Alerts provide feedback for the user.

      • pwReminder

        public void pwReminder()
        Method reminds the user for the correct way of choosing a password.

        Used to check for password security
        Parameters:
        password - is the inputed password
        Returns:
